name: Newly renovated 3 bedroom  w/wifi & parking
ISD_address: 7 S Waverly ST 22 Apt 2 Brighton MA 02135
neighborhood_overview: The Allston/Brighton neighborhood has probably the deepest and most diverse selection of restaurants of any neighborhood in Boston. Within a short walk from our home hungry guests can find food from just about any ethnicity, a traditional steak house, seafood or the recently opened Flatbreads that offers Bowling and is only a five minute walk from our property.  The property is four miles from Boston Common, which is the center of Boston, and a 20 minutes drive from Logan Airport. Supermarket, Liquor Store, Starbucks, Pharmacy, Restaurants and Retail, Bus Transportation, and Train to Downtown Boston are within 5-10 minute walk. Neighborhood is safe and well lit. Also close to Harvard Business, New Balance, WGBH, Bruins and Celtics Training Facilities, Boston University and Boston College. Target, Home Depot, Best Buy, Marshalls, Home Goods less than a mile away.
description:
***This is an entire apartment not a shared space*** Completely remodeled 1100+ square foot condo conveniently located near the Boston Landing with service to South Station. This condo comes complete with all new furnishings, enjoy peaceful slumbers on your Gel Memory Foam mattresses, cook in your newly renovated kitchen with top quality Maytag appliances, rejuvenate in your spa-like bathroom with imported Italian tile. Free on site parking available upon request at time of booking.

The space
Architecturally, the building is considered a "3 Decker" which is a design most commonly found in New England. 3 Decker style buildings were constructed in Boston as tenement housing in the late 19th early 20th century and were mostly occupied by immigrants who worked in local factories, mills and shipyards.
